LanguageData.DMS_Make_NuclearBattery.label: craft fission battery
LanguageData.DMS_Make_NuclearBattery.description: Craft a fission battery for automatroids.
LanguageData.DMS_Make_ReinforcedBarrel.label: craft reinforced barrel x4
LanguageData.DMS_Make_ReinforcedBarrel.description: Fabricate a long reinforced barrel and cut it into four segments, greatly improving production efficiency.
LanguageData.DMS_Make_Mass_ComponentIndustrial.label: batch-make components x20
LanguageData.DMS_Make_Mass_ComponentIndustrial.descri: Mass-produce components using integrated coordinated-control techniques.
LanguageData.DMS_Make_Mass_ComponentStamped.label: batch-make stamped parts x20
LanguageData.DMS_Make_Mass_ComponentStamped.descripti: Mass-produce stamped parts using integrated coordinated-control techniques.
LanguageData.DMS_Make_Plasteel.label: produce plasteel x80
LanguageData.DMS_Make_Plasteel.description: Produce plasteel using heavy industrial equipment.
LanguageData.DMS_Make_Mass_Plasteel.label: produce plasteel x400
LanguageData.DMS_Make_Mass_Plasteel.description: Mass-produce plasteel using heavy industrial equipment. This bulk recipe slightly reduces the required work.
LanguageData.DMS_Make_Mass_Tungsteel.label: produce tungsteel x400
LanguageData.DMS_Make_Mass_Tungsteel.description: Mass-produce tungsteel using heavy industrial equipment. This bulk recipe reduces both work and raw material costs.

LanguageData.DMS_Make_Neutroamine.description: Produce neutroamine using heavy industrial equipment.
LanguageData.DMS_Make_Mass_Neutroamine.label: produce neutroamine x400
LanguageData.DMS_Make_Mass_Neutroamine.description: Mass-produce neutroamine using heavy industrial equipment. This bulk recipe slightly reduces the required work.
LanguageData.DMS_PRT_Make_Synthread.label: produce synthread x80
LanguageData.DMS_PRT_Make_Synthread.description: Produce synthread using heavy industrial equipment.
LanguageData.DMS_PRT_Make_Mass_Synthread.label: produce synthread x400
LanguageData.DMS_PRT_Make_Mass_Synthread.description: Mass-produce synthread using heavy industrial equipment. This bulk recipe slightly reduces the required work and raw material usage.
